desc: Maximum number of facilities, zero means no limit
Maximum processing time, zero means no limit
Maximum travel time, zero means no limit
Maximum travel time during order preprocessing, zero means no limit
Limit computation zone using a circular mask around the current facility, using the scenario maximum speed as radius
Limit computation to the closest facility
Use or not slopes derived from DEM in the speed computation
Invert from/to groups: less facilities in 'from' group could reduce computation time
Snap facilities to grid/nearest network in a threshold. If false, build an extra line to connect facilities to the network
Enable the return path : from population to facilities
Ignore capacity and use maximum population
At each step, extract population capted, and produce population residual
